# default

**Type Property**

The text styling information is the same level of information that AVFoundation uses within a player layer.

## Declaration

```swift
static let `default`: AVPlayerItemLegibleOutput.TextStylingResolution
```

## Discussion

Specify this level of text styling resolution to receive attributed strings from an `AVPlayerItemLegibleOutput` that include the same level of styling information that AVFoundation would use itself to render text within an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLayer]. The text styling will accommodate user-level Media Accessibility settings.

## Text styling options

- **sourceAndRulesOnly**: The level of resolution excludes styling provided by the user-level Media Accessibility settings.
